greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n modulo 7.
comment: Of the partitions of numbers from 1 to 100000: 27193 are 0, 12078 are 1, 12203 are 2, 12260 are 3, 12231 are 4, 12003 are 5 and 12032 are 6 modulo 7, largely because the number of partitions of 7m+5 is always a multiple of 7.
link: Henry Bottomley, Partition calculators using java applets
Index entries for sequences related to partitions
formula: a(n) = Pm(n,1) with Pm(n,k) = if k<n then (Pm(n-k,k) + Pm(n,k+1)) mod 7 else 0^(n*(k-n)). [From _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 09 2009]
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Mar 05 2002
